text: The Pumpkin Eater is a 1964 British psychological drama movie directed by Jack Clayton and was based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Penelope Mortimer. It stars Anne Bancroft (in her Oscar nominated performance), Peter Finch, James Mason, Cedric Hardwicke, Eric Porter, Janine Gray, Yootha Joyce, Maggie Smith and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 drama movies Category:1960s psychological movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Clayton Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about abortion Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Pumpkin Eater
